text:
Richard Carter (11 December 1953 – 13 July 2019) was an Australian actor. He was born in Sydney. His best known roles were in "Rabbit-Proof Fence", "Hating Alison Ashley", ', "Happy Feet Two", "Our Lips Are Sealed", "The Great Gatsby" and '.
Carter died in the early hours of 13 July 2019 after a brief-illness at the age of 65.
